Data

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides encryption, decryption, compression, and keymaking services.
    Author:
    Hirsch Singhal

    • Method Detail

      • makeKey

        public static javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec makeKey(java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String saltString)
        Parameters:
        password - String provided by user for password.
        saltString - String provided by program to use as salt.
        Returns:
        AES key suitable for encryption and decryption of data.

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String data,
                       javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Compresses, encrypts, and converts String to Base64 in that order. If key is null, no encryption, compression, or encoding will be done.
        Parameters:
        data - String to be encrypted.
        key - Encryption key.
        Returns:
        Base64 encoded String representation of data.

      • encryptBytes

        public static java.lang.String encryptBytes(byte[] data,
                            javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Compresses, encrypts, and converts binary data to Base64 in that order. If key is null, no encryption or compression will be done.
        Parameters:
        data - Binary data to be encrypted.
        key - Encryption key.
        Returns:
        Base64 encoded String representation of data.

      • decrypt

        public static java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String data,
                       javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Performs decryption using provided SecretKeySpec key. If no key is provided, the original String is returned. Wrapper method around decryptBytes
        Parameters:
        data - Base64-encoded compressed encrypted data.
        key - SecretKeySpec to decrypt data.
        Returns:
        Decrypted, decompressed data.

      • decryptBytes

        public static byte[] decryptBytes(byte[] data,
                  javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Performs decryption using provided SecretKeySpec key. If no key is provided (unencrypted PDF), the the data is converted from Base64 and returned.
        Parameters:
        data - compressed encrypted Base64-encoded data.
        key - SecretKeySpec to decrypt data.
        Returns:
        Decrypted, decompressed data in a byte array.

      • compress

        public static byte[] compress(byte[] bytes)
        Compresses the provided byte array using GZip.
        Parameters:
        bytes - byte array to be compressed.
        Returns:
        Compressed byte array.

      • decompress

        public static byte[] decompress(byte[] bytes)
        Decompresses a byte array using GZip.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Compressed bytes.
        Returns:
        Decompressed byte array.
